alert.note: Alert for Custer; Fall River (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 1:18PM MDT until June 30 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Custer County in southwestern South Dakota... Northwestern Fall River County in southwestern South Dakota... * Until 200 PM MDT. * At 118 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Argyle, or 12 miles north of Edgemont, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Custer and northwestern Fall River Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
